@wchan I investigated the bug and the problem is here: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/rnn/python/ops/lstm_ops.py#L294

For some reason op.inputs[0] and op.inputs[1] doesn't have a shape during gradient calculations. Is it possible to fix it?

Update: After I set cell_size manually in the place above, training started to work correctly and significantly faster. Thank you for Fused LSTM and will wait a fix!
